events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with a tree on May 9, resulting in damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the details mentioning vehicle damage due to a collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the case and contact the customer for follow-up.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been officially acknowledged and will be processed promptly.
Request for police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates was sent to the claimant for further investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident report, pictures of the damaged vehicle, and repair shop quotations.
The claim investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence to verify the circumstances and extent of the accident.
Investigation concluded that the accident details match the claimant’s report and the damage is covered under policy terms.
A settlement offer covering all repair expenses after depreciation was proposed to the customer for approval.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the quick resolution process.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department following successful negotiation and customer acceptance.
Payment covering the approved repair costs was issued to the claimant’s bank account as per the agreed settlement.
The claim file was officially closed after confirmation that funds had been received and repairs were underway.
All related documents and correspondence were archived for record-keeping and future reference compliance.
